diagnosis.final_diagnosis: paranoid schizophrenia, chronic with acute exacerbation
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: organic mental syndrome, delusional disorder, psychotic depression, bipolar psychosis
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient exhibited symptoms including command auditory hallucinations and persecutory delusions that fit first-rank symptoms of schizophrenia, despite a lack of typical negative symptoms. His rapid response to neuroleptics further supported the diagnosis of schizophrenia as opposed to other considered disorders.
